title: The Beach: a river of sand
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Stanley Croner and Warren Brown
brief_description: Shows by an analysis of currents produced by waves and calculations of the accumulation and depletion of sand, that the most pronounced movement of sand is along the seashore. Also illustrates effects of breakwaters and other works.
creator_credit_for_label: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Stanley Croner and Warren Brown
